page.title: 19HOUSES IN FRANKTON
page.content: THE{CHURCH}IN FRANKTON IS{ST. NICHOLAS.THE PRESENT VICAR IS THE REV.G.BROUGH. MOST OF THE{HOUSES}ARE QUITE OLD BUT SOME ARE FAIRLY NEW. ONE OF THE NEWEST IS A BUNGALOW WHICH IS VERY BIG AND IS OWNED BY MR. MITHCELL. RECENTLY THERE HAS BEEN A NEW OWNER AT THE{LOCAL PUB, THE FRIENDSLY INN, WHICH IS TO BE MADE BIGGER. MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE IN ONE ROW. PROBABLY THE SMALLEST HOUSE IS A LITTLE BUNGALOW CLOSE TO MR. MITCHELLS. THIS IS OWNED BY MR. A'BARROW. UP A LANE OPPOSITE THE CHURCH IS THE{OLD RECTORY WHICH IS QUITE A BIG HOUSE. THIS LANE HAS MANY CONKER TREES.
